column4: I can't seem to find the uninstall option on the livecd. Help please?
musikgoI need to get rid of the bootloader
You've been here twice about that. You don't need to, and you've already been showed a way to do it. Please stop abusing support.
No one gave me answer. They all say: "ow.. it will overwrite", But I'm not gonna install a new os. I want nothing with Ubuntu anymore, but I don't want to sound disrespectful.
